revised_title: Advances in Ultrasonic Imaging and Applications in Medical Diagnosis
tldr: This article discusses the potential of ultrasonic methods in engineering and medical diagnosis, focusing on the limitations and future prospects of ultrasonics in diagnostic medicine. The author highlights the importance of understanding the physics of acoustic wave interactions with human tissues and the advancements in dynamic imaging techniques. The article also explores the applications of ultrasonics in diagnosing cardiovascular diseases and cancer, with a focus on early detection of breast cancer.
